name: Connect!
description:
A game made in 48 hours for the Bonfire Jam by Spelkollektivet.

Walkthrough for those who are stuck: WALKTHROUGH

You walk around and find another character in the level! When you get close you will connect to them and control them. When you walk out of the main characters range you will go back in the main character.

You can press Q to permanently disconnect from the other character.

Press R to restart the level.

The red buttons mean that you have to stay on them for them to be active.

Music: Drawful 2 - Draw Theme 3

Art: Me

Programming: Me

Font: MOONGLADE by Herofonts
